thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 22 of 3593
thread.title: Connie

author: Connie
title: Connie
text: I have used thrift books several times, and always receive excellent customer service, and quick delivery of my orders...I recently made an inquiry about a book that was not in my delivery, and was immediately contacted via email to let me know my account would be credited. The book actually came the next day in a separate order, and the team at thriftbooks politely told me that all was well, and to share any unwanted book with friends! Very honest and delightful team at Thriftbooks!!
